version_description:
1. Heart Rate/Blood Pressure alarm value settings added;
2. Message reminder adds Twitter/LinkedIn/Instagram/Messenger/Snapchat/Skype option, only part of the bracelets support;
3. Fix some problems of interface display before iOS11;
4. iOS13 adaptation;
5. Optimizing distance calorie algorithm;
6. Optimizing the synchronization of sports health data;
7. Optimizing feedback;
8. Optimize the display of heart rate chart;
9. Improve App stability;

1. Weather optimization
2. Russian translation optimization
3. Fixed the problem that the data of the smart watch will be cleared due to the automatic unbinding of the bracelet in some cases
4. Other bug fixed

1. Correct possible incorrect display of horizontal and vertical screens;
2. Support the smart watch (part of them) to change the settings (such as wrist lifting wake-up settings, ANCS settings, etc.);
3. Move the device module to the bottom tab bar;
4. Support to display the thumbnail of the bound smart watch;
5. Dial management optimization;
6. Fix some crash bugs to improve the app stability;
7. Improve the stability of communication between watch and app;

1. Correct the problem that the disconnection of watch in the process of automatic login may lead to the prompt that watch is bound by other mobile terminals or has been unbound;
2. Fix the problem that when the app is in the background, finding the mobile phone function does not have a reminder sound;
3. Remove the UIWebview related API;
4. Improve the stability of communication between watch and app;
5. Correct some crash problems of app to improve app stability;

1. Fix some problems in Italian translation;
2. Correct the problem of synchronization timeout when there are more sports health data;
3. Improve the stability of communication between smart watch and app;
4. Fix some crash problems of app to improve app stability;

1. Optimize weather code;
2. New watch sport mode category support;
3. Fixed some problems in Japanese and English translation;
4. Fixed the problem of connecting the watch over time but displaying the connecting all the time;
5. Improve the stability of communication between smart watch and app;
6. Fix some crash problems of app to improve app stability;

1. Add watchface DIY.
2. Rename "health monitoring" to "continuous monitoring".
3. Share now supports more third-party applications.
4. Fix some known problems.
5. Update the app privacy policy.

1. Added Croatian/Albanian;
2. Customized watchface (rectangular) background optimization;
3. Fix some other known issues;
1. Fix the known problems of iOS 14.

1. iOS14 optimization;
2. Optimization of Korean translation;
3. Fix the problem that Korean cannot be synchronized to the watch;
4. Fix some problems of women's health;

1. Weather push switch added
2. Add 240 * 280 dimensions to custom watchface
3. Message reminder: telegram added
4. Translation optimization for some languages
5. MAC address display when device discovering

1. English translation optimization;
2. Ukrainian FAQ added;
3. Other known problems fixed;

1. Portuguese localization optimization;
2. New watchface size 348 * 442 square support;
3. Specifies the watchface push position/index support;
4. OTA library upgrade;

1) Some languages localization improvement
2) Add 4 new LCD custom dials
3) Pressure measurement added for some of the watches
4) Watchface component switch for some of the watches
5) Fix some known bugs
